0.1.1.name: wordpress/events-calendar-by-plugistan
0.1.1.description:
WordPress Events Calendar by Plugistan is probably the best calendar plugin for WordPress in 2012. It's loaded with features that are flexible to customize for the needs of many. Customize look and feel, list or calendar view, add/edit/delete events, allow members to sign up for events, easy tooltips and administration panel, place it anywhere (posts, widgets, pages) with shortcodes.

Get the premium version from Plugistan.com and utilize the true power of WordPress Events Calendar by Plugistan. Premium feature includes: unlimited events, no links (completely white label solution), accept payments with PayPal or get info for invoicing, e-mail notifications and much, much more.
